segments.text: Hey ! I just bought one of those new Japanese cell phones ! It's loaded with extras .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's got a built-in video camera so you can see the person you're talking to.It also takes stills and I can use the E-mail mode to send digital pictures straight to my friend's phone !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! What else does it do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can plug it into a folding keyboard to type in message mode . l can even surf the net .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.With the 600 - second digital memory , l can record my voice and send it using voice message mode .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll love this ! I can use a stylus to draw a map on the touch screen and then use the fax mode to send it to another phone .
segments.speaker: S1
